item.title: CVE-2024-31426|2024-04-15T10:00:38.354Z -- Data443 -- Inline Related Posts
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Data443 Inline Related Posts.This issue affects Inline Related Posts: from n/a through 3.3.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-2579|2024-03-21T16:50:18.335Z -- Data443 -- Tracking Code Manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Data443 Tracking Code Manager.This issue affects Tracking Code Manager: from n/a through 2.0.16.
